router
Class Router

java.lang.Object
  router.Router

public class Router
extends java.lang.Object

The Router class provides the core router functionality and manages the services provided by the router.

Constructor Summary

          Create a Router

Constructor Detail

Router

public Router(Configuration config,
              Logger log)
Create a Router

Parameters:
config - The configuration to use for the router
log - The logger to use for the router
Method Detail

register

public void register(RouterService service)
Register a RouterService with the Router. If the specified service is already registered this method does nothing. Note: Can't be called while the Router is running.

Parameters:
service - Service to register

deregister

public void deregister(RouterService service)
Deregister a RouterService with the Router. If the specified service hasn't been registered this method does nothing. Note: Can't be called while the Router is running.

Parameters:
service - Service to deregister

start

public void start()
Start the Router.

stop

public void stop()
Stop the Router.

join

public void join()
Wait for all the registered services to die.

isRunning

public boolean isRunning()
Check if the router is running

Returns:
true if the router is running, false otherwise
